Class AbstractStatement<ResultType>

java.lang.Object
de.s42.dl.services.database.AbstractStatement<ResultType>
Type Parameters:
ResultType -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Statement<ResultType>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateEntity, DeleteEntities, DeleteEntity, DynamicStatement, ExecuteStatement, FindEntities, FindEntity, GetEntities, UpdateEntity
public abstract class AbstractStatement<ResultType> extends Object implements Statement<ResultType>
